      • GrayLevelCooccurrenceMatrix

        public GrayLevelCooccurrenceMatrix(int distance,
                                   GrayLevelCooccurrenceMatrix.Degree degree)
        Initialize a new instance of the GrayLevelCooccurrenceMatrix class.
        Parameters:
        distance - Specifies the scale at which the texture is analysed.
        degree - Indicates the direction where the coocurrence is found.

      • GrayLevelCooccurrenceMatrix

        public GrayLevelCooccurrenceMatrix(int distance,
                                   GrayLevelCooccurrenceMatrix.Degree degree,
                                   boolean normalize)
        Initialize a new instance of the GrayLevelCooccurrenceMatrix class.
        Parameters:
        distance - Specifies the scale at which the texture is analysed.
        degree - Indicates the direction where the coocurrence is found.
        normalize - Normalize GLCM. Divides each element per number of pairs.

      • GrayLevelCooccurrenceMatrix

        public GrayLevelCooccurrenceMatrix(int distance,
                                   GrayLevelCooccurrenceMatrix.Degree degree,
                                   boolean normalize,
                                   boolean autoGray)
        Initialize a new instance of the GrayLevelCooccurrenceMatrix class.
        Parameters:
        distance - Specifies the scale at which the texture is analysed.
        degree - Indicates the direction where the coocurrence is found.
        normalize - Normalize GLCM. Divides each element per number of pairs.
        autoGray - Determine the GLCM for 255 (false) or maximum gray found (true).

    • Method Detail

      • isAutoGray

        public boolean isAutoGray()
        Verify Automatic gray.
        Returns:
        True if need to find maximum gray in current image, otherwise is set 255.

      • setAutoGray

        public void setAutoGray(boolean autoGray)
        Set Automatic gray.
        Parameters:
        autoGray - True if need to find maximum gray in current image, otherwise is set 255.

      • isNormalize

        public boolean isNormalize()
        Verify if te GLCM is normalized.
        Returns:
        True if the GLCM is normalized, otherwise false.

      • setNormalize

        public void setNormalize(boolean normalize)
        Set Normalize.
        Parameters:
        normalize - True for normalize the GLCM, otherwise false.
